main event: A bright object was observed in the night sky over Aviano AB, Italy, with radar confirmation of its presence.
interesting points: The observation was made using ground radar from a military source., The object appeared very bright, resembling a light bulb against a clear blue sky., It was observed to be stationary on two separate sightings eight minutes apart., The object remained visible for a total of 12 minutes., The report includes details about atmospheric conditions and the reliability of the witnesses.
sighted object: a bright object in the night sky
witness description: Rex A. Hill, Captain (USAF), and Gary G. Boettcher, 1st Lt (USAF), both pilots with excellent reliability
